sqlMap.insert: insert into board (num, name, pwd, email, subject, content, ipAddr, hitCount, created) values (#num#, #name#, #pwd#, #email#, #subject#, #content#, #ipAddr#, 0, sysdate)
sqlMap.select: select nvl(count(num),0) from board where $searchKey$ like '%' || #searchValue# || '%'

select * from( select rownum rnum, data.* from ( select num,name,subject,hitCount,to_char(created,'YYYY-MM-DD') created from board where $searchKey$ like '%' || #searchValue# || '%' order by num desc ) data) where rnum>=#start# and rnum<=#end#
select num, name, pwd, email, subject, content, ipAddr, hitCount, created from board where num=#num#
select rownum, data.* from (select num, subject from board where ($searchKey$ like '%' || #searchValue# || '%') and (num>#num#) order by num asc) data where rownum=1
select rownum, data.* from (select num, subject from board where ($searchKey$ like '%' || #searchValue# || '%') and (num<#num#) order by num desc) data where rownum=1
sqlMap.update: update board set hitCount=hitCount+1 where num=#num#
